org.springframework.context.annotation

接口 ImportAware

  • 所有超级接口:
    Aware
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractCachingConfiguration, AbstractJCacheConfiguration, LoadTimeWeavingConfiguration, MBeanExportConfiguration, ProxyCachingConfiguration, ProxyJCacheConfiguration

    public interface ImportAware
extends Aware
    Interface to be implemented by any @Configuration class that wishes to be injected with the AnnotationMetadata of the @Configuration class that imported it. Useful in conjunction with annotations that use @Import as a meta-annotation.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.1

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setImportMetadata(AnnotationMetadata importMetadata)
      Set the annotation metadata of the importing @Configuration class.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setImportMetadata

        void setImportMetadata(AnnotationMetadata importMetadata)
        Set the annotation metadata of the importing @Configuration class.
